Department: NUS Grad Sch For Integrative Sci & Engg
ModuleDescription: 'Biology of Disease' module aims to deliver an understanding of human disease from a bench to bedside perspective. This series of 4 capsule modules is designed to introduce students to the basic biology and clinical pathology underlying human disease. The discussion of each disease will be led by two faculty members highlighting the fundamental molecular basis of cellular function, followed by a clinical perspective.
